New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons

3 drawings. Drawing a: Only a drop in the bucket, Now let him kick. Drawing b: U.S. Bonds. "The Largely Increased Purchases of Bonds for the Sinking Fund." Drawing c: Things Don't Seem to Balance! [Treasury Secretary William Windom, Wall Street bonds, taxes, pensions]

3 pen drawings mounted together. Signed Th:Nast. 1889.
